channel.title: Fucking hamachi
channel.description: My friend asked me to install hamachi, so I did. But after restarting a few days later, I found that I can no longer connect to my wireless! It has a wpa2 encryption, and whenever I try to connect windows tells me it either can't authenticate or it can't connect. However, it can still connect to the (encrypted) hotspot I'm creating from my phone. This really sucks because I want to use my home wifi, what can I do? Google hasn't helped out here. EDIT: That was annoying, fixed it though. Turned out the router had been malfunctioning... I've run into this problem with hamachi before though, luckily it wasn't happening now.

item.title: Fucking hamachi
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Unfortunately can’t disable the encryption. Landlord doesn’t want that. Also, the encryption seems to work fine from my phones hotspot. I could probably mess around with the router if he doesn’t realize though.

Read full topic

item.title: Fucking hamachi
item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown
item.description:
@maniown wrote:

Disable the Encryption on it?
